item.description:
A great tradition for old hands, and a great way for newer members to get to know us better. We honor our hard-working and-hard playing members whom you the voters chose. Come enjoy the great outdoors, beautiful scenery, and a super potluck supper as we celebrate the winners of our annual awards. There are some new and funky categories this year. Plus, you may be a winner, so be there in person--don’t make us say, “Now accepting the award on behalf of . . .” !

What to Bring
BYOB
Food for the potluck
A lawn chair
Mosquito repellent

Directions available upon request when you RSVP.
item.name: House Party - Awards Night
